mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT IMPLPLANNM, DOCREGSTARTDT, DOCREGENDDT FROM T_CERT_TEST WHERE DOCREGENDDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DOCREGSTARTDT DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT IMPLPLANNM, PRACREGSTARTDT, PRACREGENDDT FROM T_CERT_TEST WHERE PRACREGENDDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY PRACREGSTARTDT DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT IMPLPLANNM, DOCEXAMSTARTDT FROM T_CERT_TEST WHERE DOCEXAMSTARTDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DOCEXAMSTARTDT DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT IMPLPLANNM, PRACEXAMSTARTDT, PRACEXAMENDDT FROM T_CERT_TEST WHERE PRACEXAMENDDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY PRACEXAMSTARTDT DESC;

SELECT A.JMFLDNM, T.IMPLPLANNM, T.DOCREGSTARTDT, T.DOCREGENDDT FROM T_CERT_TEST T, (SELECT C.JMFLDNM FROM T_FAV_CERT F, T_CERT C WHERE USER_ID = '${userId}' AND F.CERT_IDX = C.CERT_IDX) A WHERE A.JMFLDNM = T.JMFLDNM AND T.DOCREGENDDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY PRACEXAMSTARTDT DESC;

SELECT A.JMFLDNM, T.IMPLPLANNM, T.PRACREGSTARTDT, T.PRACREGENDDT FROM T_CERT_TEST T, (SELECT C.JMFLDNM FROM T_FAV_CERT F, T_CERT C WHERE USER_ID = '${userId}' AND F.CERT_IDX = C.CERT_IDX) A WHERE A.JMFLDNM = T.JMFLDNM AND T.PRACREGENDDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY PRACREGSTARTDT DESC;

SELECT A.JMFLDNM, T.IMPLPLANNM, T.DOCEXAMSTARTDT FROM T_CERT_TEST T, (SELECT C.JMFLDNM FROM T_FAV_CERT F, T_CERT C WHERE USER_ID = '${userId}' AND F.CERT_IDX = C.CERT_IDX) A WHERE A.JMFLDNM = T.JMFLDNM AND T.DOCEXAMSTARTDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DOCEXAMSTARTDT DESC;

SELECT A.JMFLDNM, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), T.DOCREGSTARTDT) AS DDAY FROM T_CERT_TEST T, (SELECT C.JMFLDNM FROM T_FAV_CERT F, T_CERT C WHERE USER_ID = '${userId}' AND F.CERT_IDX = C.CERT_IDX) A WHERE A.JMFLDNM = T.JMFLDNM AND T.DOCREGSTARTDT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND T.DOCREGSTARTDT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW() + INTERVAL 7 DAY, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY PRACEXAMSTARTDT DESC;
